Label: Oxaloacetate
Comment: Not in original drawing, adapted from https://www.wikipathways.org/index.php/Pathway:WP78

Label: (S)-malate
Comment: Not in original drawing, adapted from https://www.wikipathways.org/index.php/Pathway:WP78

Label: LDHC
Comment: AKA lactate dehydrogenase C; expressed in testes.

Label: 2-KGD complex
Comment: Composed of 3 subunits</br>'Homodimer. The 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase (ODH) complex contains multiple copies of three enzymatic components: 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase (E1), dihydrolipoamide succinyltransferase (E2) and lipoamide dehydrogenase (E3) (By similarity).' [https://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/Q1B4V6]

Label: LDH1
Comment: AKA LDH-1 lactate dehydrogenase 1, 4H; expressed in heart, red blood cells (RBC), brain)

Label: LDH2
Comment: AKA LDH-2 lactate dehydrogenase 2 (3H1M); expressed in reticuloendohelial system

Label: LDH3
Comment: AKA LDH-3 lactate dehydrogenase 3 (2H2M); expressed in lungs

Label: LDH4
Comment: AKA LDH-4 lactate dehydrogenase 4 (1H3M); expressed in kidneys, placenta, pancreas.

Label: LDH5
Comment: AKA LDH-5 lactate dehydrogenase 5 (4M); expressed in liver, striated muscle, brain.
